preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 110.5 g of Bismuth using a digital scale. 
 2. Weigh 17.4 g of Praseodymium. 
 3. Weigh 177.0 g of Yttrium. 
 4. Combine all materials in a clean, heat-resistant crucible. 
 5. Stir the mixture thoroughly to ensure even distribution of the elements.
